name: Mod walkthrough strategy game guides for on NWN
author: Asturonethoriusaline

posts.author: Asturonethoriusaline
posts.content:
Hey Hi all. I havent found, seen any walkthrough strategy game guides fir Mods, PW's here.

For example:

In the Pool of Radiance Mod, for on NWN. Character 5th level. Cant figure out how to get to Sokol Keep.

And I dont see a game guide to help me with that.

Are there such game guides here?

If so where?

If there isnt any such guides here, would anybody be willing to either make such guides, an or post links to such guides here?

Thanks for, if any help.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
No, you won't find any walkthroughs here and nor should there be, that's not what we're here for. We're here to build characters. We leave the mods and PWs to be explored fresh, as their authors intended.

On occasion you will find a few answers to specific questions and problems, but no real spoilers or guides.

Many mods and PWs will have their own sites, where such things might be provided, or maybe you could ask in the Vault?

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
The game comes with a Toolset.

If one wants to know something about a Mod, just open it in the Toolset and take a look.

It is that easy.  No guides, etc needed.

PWs are a different story, and there are plenty of "guides, advice, tips, etc" for each and every one, put together painstakingly by the Players who play there!  But were they to post these publically, they would risk getting admonished (if not outright banned) by the builders of said PW.
